content.question: Directions: The suggested planning and writing time for the question below is 35 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your answer. Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. “In the second half of the nineteenth century, most European governments were conservative.” To what extent is the quotation an accurate statement? Use specific examples from at least TWO countries.

topic.text: 6.5: The Concert of Europe and European Conservatism

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
